title: Allow importing multi-file GGUF models
summary:
### What is the issue?

Currently Ollama can [import GGUF files](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/import.md). However, larger models are sometimes split into separate files. Ollama should support loading multiple GGUF files similar to loading safetensor files.


### OS

_No response_

summary: The RAG Overview tab had multiple critical bugs: provider status always showed "Offline", test connection displayed "undefined dimensions", page failed to load data on mount, and configuration errors triggered circuit breaker false positives. Additionally, the pgvector column had dimension mismatch
